dct_title_s: Mapemonde planisphere ou carte generale du monde
dct_description_sm: Chez D de la Feuille excudit, avec Privilege.
California shown as a labeled island with a pointed northern coast.
"Tom 1. Pag. 1" (upper right, inside neat line), "2" (upper right, outside border). Top of western hemisphere: "Septentrion", bottom: "Midy". Top of eastern hemisphere: "Nord", bottom: "Sud".
Title at top inside the border. Secondary title in small cartouche at upper right.

Issued in his Oorlogs tabletten, of uytgesochte kaarten, tot gemak der officieren en reysigers..., Amsterdam, 1706; The military tablettes ... Amsterdam, 1707. Reissued in Dutch 1711, 1732. Reissued in French 1708 and in both French and Dutch titles and text 1717; Oorlogs-toneel ..., Amsterdam, 1711; Les tablettes guerrieres ... Amsterdam, 1707. Reissued in 1708, 1711, 1717, 1721, 1732. (May have also been issued in 1726, 1729.); Geographisch-toneel ... / J. Rateband en compagnie. -- Amsterdam, 1732.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
